name: The Last Lightning
description:
The Last Lightning is a top down survival game made for the weekly game jam #170.

The theme of the game jam was "Chain reaction".

Only arm with your powerful lightning, you must survive against endless waves of enemies. Your weapon can zap multiple enemy at once if they are grouped up. But be careful, once you kill an enemy with your lightning, you need to go pick it back up.

Control 

wasd or arrow keys to move

Left click to shoot the lightning

Enemy type

Zombie (Light green and brown) 

Small enemy that runs toward you to kill you.

Killing one gives you 1 point.

Speedster (Red and yellow) 

Fast enemy that sprints toward you at the speed of light.

Killing one gives you 2 points.

Boomer (White and orange) 

Slow enemy that explodes into 3 bullets once they die.

Killing one gives you 3 points.

Giant Zombie (Dark green and brown) 

Slow enemy that takes two shots to kill.

Killing one gives you 5 points.

Defenders (Blue and yellow) 

An enemy that deflect your lightning right to your face. You'll need to kill them with a rebound shot.

Killing one gives you 4 points.
